# 缘梦项目笔记——网赚掘金实操项目电子书 1904

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-1904
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-1904
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-1904
yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-1904 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-yijiulingsi
yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-yijiulingsi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
